name: Tower of Cards
description:
Choose your monsters and defend your tower in a mix of card game and tower defense.

Cards are your soldiers, they will take roles of either Attack or Defense. Each card has an action point AP() cost to play it. The player has 5 AP total

Defense: 1 AP Very high health, strong defender. 

Attack: 3AP Strong attacker, but very expensive to play.

Attack: 2AP Moderate damage and health

Defense: 2AP A glass cannon, very high damage but extremely low health.

Defense: 1AP Cheap but not very strong in any way, useful for filling extra slots

Made for Mix and GAME jam 2020
